author: Deccan
title: Here comes the 7
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 14, 2015, 00.40 am Titled after the English number, 7 directed by Chandrashekar Srivatsav which is all set to hit the screens soon. After his first two failures at the box office, the director who also portrays the lead in the film is confident of getting third time lucky with this flick. Breaking away from a Gandhinagar ritual, the team has chosen a theatre on Magadi Road for its release. Which seems daring enough, given the fraternity’s superstitious beliefs.
RAM LEELA AUDIO MANIA The audio of the Chiranjeevi Sarja and Amulya starrer Ram Leela was released by the lead actor’s brother Dhruva Sarja on his birthday. The crew released each song individually. Darshan also released the audio album in which Puneeth Rajkumar has sung for a number composed by Anup Rubens. HERE COMES BIGG BOSS The third season of Bigg Boss in Kannada hosted by Kiccha Sudeep is scheduled to be broadcast in the last week of October. Among the most popular TV reality shows in Kannada, this time, the show will be shot at a special set at the Innovative Film City near Bengaluru.
